quote: I know that I'm doomed and I'm not going to struggle against my fate. I am only writing this down so that when you do not see me any more you will know that my enemy has finally triumphed.
quote_letters: I KNOW THAT IM DOOMED AND IM NOT GOING TO STRUGGLE AGAINST MY FATE I AM ONLY WRITING THIS DOWN SO THAT WHEN YOU DO NOT SEE ME ANY MORE YOU WILL KNOW THAT MY ENEMY HAS FINALLY TRIUMPHED
